docs.text: Overview ¶ This document contains documentation for the following APIs: math
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: This document contains documentation for the following APIs: math
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: .math.abs ¶ Returns absolute value of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number. Returns: Type Description number Absolute value of x. .math.acos ¶ Returns the arccosine of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number. Returns: Type Description number Arccosine of x, in radians. The result is between 0 and π. Null is returned if the argument is not between -1 and 1. .math.asin ¶ Returns the arcsine of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number. Returns: Type Description number Arcsine of x, in radians. The result is between -π/2 and π/2. Null is returned if the argument is not between -1 and 1. .math.atan ¶ Returns the arctangent of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number. Returns: Type Description number Arctangent of x, in radians. The result is between -π/2 and π/2. .math.avg ¶ Returns the arithmetic mean of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number[] A numeric list. Returns: Type Description float Arithmetic mean of x. Null is returned if x is empty, or contains both positive and negative infinity. Null items in x are ignored. .math.cos ¶ Returns the cosine of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number in radians. Returns: Type Description number Cosine of x. The result is between -1 and 1, or null if the argument is null or infinity. .math.runningAvg ¶ Returns the running averages of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number[] A numeric list. Returns: Type Description float Running averages of x. It applies function .math.avg to successive prefixes of x. .math.sin ¶ Returns the sine of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number in radians Returns: Type Description number Sine of x. The result is between -1 and 1, or null if the argument is null or infinity. .math.tan ¶ Returns the tangent of x. Parameter: Name Type Description x number A number in radians. Returns: Type Description number Tangent of x. The result is null if the argument is null or infinity.
